title: Reflective and Collaborative Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theories and domain expertise in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Professionals in medical/legal/technical fields lacking practical instructional design experience for science-based problem solving

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose science domain instructional design problems with over 80% accuracy by applying IDT (Instructional Design Theory) principles
Design drafts can be iteratively improved at least three times through collaborative feedback routines
External representation artifacts reflecting reflective thinking can be produced using online collaboration tools

resources: Science Domain Instructional Design Case Database

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
